overview: The name is Alex De Renzy, and no one else comes close! Now, for the first time, the erotic master's most sizzling scenes from his award-winning movies are available on video cassette. And what scorchers! You can look forward to the horny highlights starring Nina Hartley, Porsche Lynn, Eva Allen, Sharon Kane, Shanna McCullough, and many more of erotica's finest stars!
tagline: Does anyone do it better than erotica's legendary producer-director? Hardly!
title: The De Renzy Tapes
